general_summary: The lift showed significant ankle stability issues. Focus on mastering spinal alignment fundamentals to build a strong foundation and prevent compensations.

remedial_plan.name: Single-Leg Balance Holds
remedial_plan.adaptive_reasoning: Builds proprioception and ankle strength to improve joint control during lifts

timeline_events.detailed_explanation: Your ankle instability occurs when leaning too far forward. Maintain a neutral spine alignment to distribute weight evenly through both feet and reduce ankle stress.
